x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
Qatar - Reservations - defaulting to Map view breaks Default Floor Plan functionality
When you save the setting, the defaults changes, however when you close and reopen the Reservation app, the map does not go to the default you set.
Reproduction Steps :
1. Open Reservation app 2. Select setting option (top right gear) 3. Set floor default to a floor on this instance, and it's appropriate site. 4. Select saved 5. Reopen Reservation app and default doesn't save.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Reservation - Map does not go to default
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Fix version for this issue is Romania but the resolution is also included in Qatar Patch 3. Reach out to Technical Engineering team mentioning "SFM-10119" in case comments.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.sys_name: Reservation - Map does not go to default
